name: Take Flight Early Demo
description:
An early concept for a low poly flight simulator. Best played with a controller!

I really hope you enjoy this prototype please feel free to leave any feedback in the comments or tweet me @riptide_studios !

Controls:

Quit - Escape

Keyboard & Mouse:

Pitch down - W

Pitch up  - S

Bank left - A

Bank right - D

Turn left - Left Arrow

Turn right - Right Arrow

Acceleration - Q

Deceleration - E

Controller:

Pitch & bank - Left analog stick

Acceleration - Right trigger

Deceleration - Left trigger

Turn left - Left bumper

Turn right - Right bumper
